name: Rize Technology Corporation
tag_list: web-application-development, rich-internet-application-development, mobile-apps-development, custom-software-development, hadoop-development, big-data-solutions, remote-infrastructure-management, database-management, professional-outsourcing-services, joo
overview:
Rize Technology Corporation Inc. is a global IT services company that specializes in the development of enterprise web, mobile, cloud solutions and technology support services based on wide range of technologies.

We provide innovative, advanced and scalable software, web application and product development solutions that are cost-effective and that will enable our clients to get faster ROI. We have developed significant expertise and project portfolio by focusing on open source (LAMP, Java, and RIA), Microsoft (dot Net, SQL) and mobile (iPhone, Android and Windows mobile) technologies.

Our IT infrastructure management and tech support division will handle client systems, optimization, maintenance and support services with dedicated teams working for them 24x7 facilitating team collaboration and project execution, ensuring projects and systems are live and up-to-date and aligned with business objectives.

milestones.description: Incorporated as a Pvt. Limited Company with corporate head office at Hyderabad.
